medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric and right upper quadrant pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain awoke her from sleep 8 hours ago and has been relatively unremitting despite morphine 2mg x 4. She also experienced several episodes of emesis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Symptomatic cholelithiasis, treated twice at an outside hospital. Previously declined recommended cholecystectomy.
